name: Rajat Dagar
message: Hello! I’m Rajat Dagar, a passionate college student pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science. I love exploring new ideas and challenging myself to grow academically and creatively. This portfolio showcases my journey through various projects, experiences that reflect both my skills and my curiosity. I’m eager to connect with peers, mentors, and potential collaborators who share my enthusiasm for learning and innovation. Thank you for stopping by—feel free to explore my work and reach out if you'd like to get in touch!
